title: TypeError: instance.draw is not a function   Drawable canvas
body:
While working on preview, I noticed in the drawable canvas context keypoints aren't rendering
This feels like something that was already solved in annotation core since it works there
To reproduce visit the explorer, or task view in this branch, with any thing that has a keypoint instance

```
instance_list.vue?f1f5:554 Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: instance.draw is not a function
    at VueComponent.draw_single_instance (webpack-internal:///./node_modules/ts-loader/index.js?!./node_modules/vue-loader/lib/index.js?!./src/components/vue_canvas/instance_list.vue?vue&type=script&lang=ts&:483)
    at VueComponent.draw (webpack-internal:///./node_modules/ts-loader/index.js?!./node_modules/vue-loader/lib/index.js?!./src/components/vue_canvas/instance_list.vue?vue&type=script&lang=ts&:240)
    at eval (webpack-internal:///./src/vue-canvas.js:39)
    at new Promise (<anonymous>)
    at eval (webpack-internal:///./src/vue-canvas.js:38)
draw_single_instance @ instance_list.vue?f1f5:554
draw @ instance_list.vue?f1f5:275
eval @ vue-canvas.js?805f:45
eval @ vue-canvas.js?805f:44
13KeypointInstance.ts?96f5:530 Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'raw')
    at KeypointInstance.is_mouse_in_path (webpack-internal:///./src/components/vue_canvas/instances/KeypointInstance.ts:454)
    at KeypointInstance.draw_point_and_set_node_hover_index (webpack-internal:///./src/components/vue_canvas/instances/KeypointInstance.ts:487)
    at KeypointInstance.draw (webpack-internal:///./src/components/vue_canvas/instances/KeypointInstance.ts:368)
    at VueComponent.draw_single_instance (webpack-internal:///./node_modules/ts-loader/index.js?!./node_modules/vue-loader/lib/index.js?!./src/components/vue_canvas/instance_list.vue?vue&type=script&lang=ts&:483)
    at VueComponent.draw (webpack-internal:///./node_modules/ts-loader/index.js?!./node_modules/vue-loader/lib/index.js?!./src/components/vue_canvas/instance_list.vue?vue&type=script&lang=ts&:240)
    at eval (webpack-internal:///./src/vue-canvas.js:39)
    at new Promise (<anonymous>)
    at eval (webpack-internal:///./src/vue-canvas.js:38)
````
